title: Universe/Frames/PointOrbit
description: Configuration for PointOrbit points in frames plugin based on Keplerian elements defined around a central point using specific axes

center.description: Center point around which the orbit is defined

epoch.description: Reference epoch where the initial true anomaly is defined

ran.description: Right ascension of the ascending node of the orbit

aop.description: Argument of periapsis of the orbit

tan.description: Initial true anomaly defined at the reference epoch

gm.description: Gravitational parameter of the central body
